body.p:
Beattyville Ky
Sept 2nd 1865
To the Gov Ky.
Thomas E Bramlette.

We the undersigned would respectfully ask you to remit a fine against=Warwick McGuire, who stands indicted before the Owsley Circuit Court for assault & Battery upon the person of Isaac Plummer in the years 56 or 6057. Said Plummer went off into a guerilla Band, while McGuire entered the Union Army, made a good Soldier and since his discharge has been a peacable and law abiding Citizen.
